resources.string:
In this app you can search for a royalty free images by typing in what you are searching for.
 
 To save the image in your gallery: hold the image and click save.
 
 Images powered by Pixabay. 
 
 App created by Bart in t Veld. 
 
 Feel free to donate and I will make sure that more awesome apps will be coming (◕‿◕)"
